title: Emerald & Diamond Nakshi Work Bridal Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Premium Quality Emeralds ( Zambian ) with excellent clarity and vibrant green color
features: Elaborate Nakshi work (నక్షి పని) showcasing traditional South Indian craftsmanship. Features a tiered design with a central pendant and intricate detailing. The Emeralds are set in a closed setting (kundan style hints present). The design includes a 'kundan' style setting in some areas, creating a rich and textured look. The pearl drops add a touch of elegance and movement to the piece.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green Emerald accents and the soft
creamy white of the freshwater pearls. A harmonious combination representing prosperity and purity.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale parties and cultural events.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exquisite South Indian artistry. The rich Nakshi work, combined with the vibrant Emeralds and lustrous pearls, makes it a truly unforgettable piece. The 22K gold ensures lasting value and a luxurious feel. A heirloom quality piece that can be passed down through generations.
